scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.update npm: echo "Updates root and client" && npm update && cd client && npm update
scripts.install packages: npm install && npm install mongodb --save && npm i --save mongo-image-converter &&npm install -g nodemon && npm install @googlemaps/google-maps-services-js && npm install dotenv -- save && npm install googleapis && npm install @googleapis/people && npm install --save @sendgrid/mail && npm install twilio && echo "SERVER Packages Installed " && cd client && npm install && npm install -g typescript && npm i hookrouter --legacy-peer-deps && npm i @types/hookrouter && npm install -i @foursquare/foursquare-places  && npm install react-phone-input-2 --save && npm install --save react-cropper && npx browserslist --update-db && npm install idb && echo "Client Packages Installed "
